Method Detail

initializeAuthFlow

void initializeAuthFlow(BoxClient boxClient,
                        java.lang.Object applicationContext)
Initialize the UI for OAuth flow. This needs to be called everytime before starting an auth flow.

Parameters:
boxClient - BoxClient
applicationContext - application specific context.

authenticate

void authenticate(IAuthFlowListener listener)
Authenticate.

Parameters:
listener - listener listening to events/messages fired during authentication process.
